title: Gourmet Couples’ Retreat with Stunning Views of Wilsons Prom
description: Whisk someone special away on a luxury escape to The Church House Boutique Gourmet Retreat, located just a 30-minute drive from picturesque Wilsons Prom. Stay in one of two exclusive adults-only suites with a custom-made outdoor spa and incredible views over Fish Creek and Wilsons Prom. Included is a daily gourmet cooked breakfast served on the East Veranda, one three-course paddock-to-plate dining experience, nightly pre-dinner drink and canapés, and a leisurely midday check-out.
location_description: The Church House Boutique Gourmet Retreat
